remarks: Given a homotopy from ` F ` to ` G ` , produce a homotopy from ` G ` to ` F ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ishtpy.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
ishtpy.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
ishtpy.4 $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
htpycom.6 $e |- M = ( x e. X , y e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) |-> ( x H ( 1 - y ) ) ) $.
htpycom.7 $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( F ( J Htpy K ) G ) ) $.
htpycom $p |- ( ph -> M e. ( G ( J Htpy K ) F ) ) $.
$d H x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d ph x y $.
